name: News
instructions: MCP Server - News Model Context Protocol Server Implementation

get_all_news_field_names.name: get_all_news_field_names
get_all_news_field_names.description: Get a list of the fields thare are held by the news service for a each news item

get_news.name: get_news
get_news.description: Get a list of matching news articles by passing a stock name and a case sensitive regex pattern, all news for that stock will be returned

annotations.title: Get all news items that matches the given stock name regex pattern
